titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Knox Mellon California Democratic Council Papers LSC.1061

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-09-07 14:31:59 -0700.

did.unittitle: Knox Mellon California Democratic Council Papers
did.abstract: William Knox Mellon, Jr. was a professor of history at Immaculate Heart College and the Democratic nominee for the CA 24th District for Congress in 1962. Mellon became treasurer of the Oral History Association. Collection consists of correspondence, records, and printed material relating to the California Democratic Council and to CA politics in general during the 1960s.
did.physloc: Stored off-site. All requests to access special collections material must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. All requests to access special collections materials must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Reproduction
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical objects belong to UCLA Library Special Collections. All other rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Knox Mellon California Democratic Council Papers (Collection Number 1061). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by UCLA Library Special Collections staff.

Collections are processed to a variety of levels depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived user interest and research value, availability of staff and resources, and competing priorities. Library Special Collections provides a standard level of preservation and access for all collections and, when time and resources permit, conducts more intensive processing. These materials have been arranged and described according to national and local standards and best practices.

We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: William Knox Mellon, Jr. was born on Oct. 20, 1925 in Houston, TX; BA, Pomona College, 1950; MA, Claremont College, 1953; Ph.D, Claremont Graduate School, 1972; became a professor of history at Immaculate Heart College; Democratic nominee for the CA 24th District for Congress, 1962; became treasurer, Oral History Assn.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of correspondence, records, and printed material relating to the California Democratic Council and to CA politics in general during the 1960s. Includes clippings, newsletters, pamphlets, and periodicals, files on Democratic candidates, and CDC by-laws, files on conventions, committees, board meetings, and the 1960 presidential campaign.

arrangement.head: Organization and Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Arranged in the following series:
Political files covering local politics and candidates (boxes 1-4)
Miscellaneous subject files (boxes 5-8)
Newsletters, commentaries, pamphlets by and about the CDC (boxes 9-10)
California Democratic Council files, 1959-1967 (boxes 11-15).

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Joyce Fadem Papers (Collection 1109) . Available at the Library Special Collections.
California Democratic Council Records (Collection 1389) . Available at the Library Special Collections.
Charles G. Gant California Democratic Council Records (Collection 1073) . Available at the Library Special Collections.
Joseph L. Wyatt Collection of California Democratic Council Records (Collection 1082) . Available at the Library Special Collections.
